content: Chapter 2 has a secret area called the Kingdom of Sahali. When you step inside, you'll actually find two secret bosses. The first is the Tiger Vanguard, who will deem you worthy to meet his king once you've defeated him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 2', specifically from the subsection 'Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 2 has a secret area called the Kingdom of Sahali. When you step inside, you'll actually find two secret bosses. The first is the Tiger Vanguard, who will deem you worthy to meet his king once you've defeated him.
